description: Today I was desperate. Been walking around the city centre for more than two hours without any result. Just when I wanted to switch the cam off, I´ve spotted the first considerable victim of mine. Been praying like never before so he says yes to my offer. After a short chat with him, I kinda knew he will go for the money. He didn´t have a proper full time job and his girlfriend makes just 10,000 per month. So I bet on his feelings towards her and offered him money so he can invite her for a nice dinner or something. And he liked that idea. Soon after that I saw his dick, just there on the street. Now I just had to find a proper sum to offer and he would be mine as I really had to put my dick into a young and nice guy´s mouth very soon.
title: Czech Hunter 171
